members.member:
Merges the Border object passed in with the current object. Each property is copied from the passed in object to the current object only if the corresponding property in the current object is NOT defined.
Merges settings of the specified Border object with the current Border object.
Object whose settings are merged with the current Border object

Merges the Border object passed in with the current object. If force is true, each property is copied from the passed in object to the current object if the property is defined within the passed in object. If force is false, each property is copied from the passed in object to the current object only if the corresponding property in the current object is NOT defined.
Merges settings of the specified Border object with the current Border object with the option to force a merge if the settings are defined in the current Border object.
Object whose settings are merged with the current Border object Whether settings are overridden in the current Border object

member.name: T:FarPoint.Web.Spread.CommandBar
member.summary:
Summary description for CommandBar. Command button layout
For upper level browser
1. Operation Mode = Normal | Update | Cancel | Copy | Paste | Cut | Insert(optional) | Delete(optional) | Next(optional) | Prev(optional) |
2. Operation Mode = RowMode | Update | Cancel | Insert(optional) | Delete(optional) | Next(optional) | Prev(optional) |
3. Operation Mode = ReadOnly/SingleSelect | Next(optional) | Prev(optional) |
For down level browser 1. Operation Mode = RowMode or Operation Mode = Normal | Edit | Update | Cancel | Insert(optional) | Delete(optional) | Next(optional) | Prev(optional) |
2. Operation Mode = ReadOnly/SingleSelect | Next(optional) | Prev(optional) |
For RenderEditors mode | Update | Cancel | Next(optional) | Prev(optional) |

member.name: T:FarPoint.Web.Spread.OperationMode
member.summary: Specifies how the sheet responds to user interaction and how selection behaves.

members.member:
Performs default sheet operations
Allows users to perform default spreadsheet selecting and editing

Sets a sheet to read-only mode; within this mode, there is no currently active cell
Allows users to see the data but not to select or edit any cell or row in the sheet

Allows users to select rows in a sheet, and edit individual cells in rows by double-clicking a cell
Allows users to select (highlight) a single row only and to edit an individual cell in that row

Allows users to select a single row in a sheet, similar to a single-selection list box
Allows users to select (highlight) a single row only but not to edit any cell

member.name: F:FarPoint.Web.Spread.PagerPosition.TopBottom

member.name: P:FarPoint.Web.Spread.FpSpread.RenderCSSClass
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the control should render the styles by using CSS styles or by using in-line style attributes.
member.remarks: Gets or sets whether the control should render the styles, such as BackColor, ForeColor, Font, etc., by using cascading style sheet (CSS) styles or by using in-line style attributes. The default is to use the in-line style attributes. If this property is true, the control renders the styles as CSS styles. That reduces the page size and speeds up loading the ASPX page. When this property is true, the control checks if a cell renderer supports the ICSSClassSupport interface. If the cell renderer supports the ICSSClassSupport interface and the CssClass property of the cell renderer is null or empty string, the control renders the style for the cell as a CSS style. Otherwise, the control renders the style as in-line style attributes.

members.member:
The default value for the PageMaxAlign property is True. When the PageMaxAlign property is set to true, the last page displays the PageSize of rows. Some of the rows might be displayed in the previous page. When the PageMaxAlign property is set to false, the last page displays only the rows that are not displayed in the previous page.
Gets or sets whether to show the maximum number of rows on the last page.

member.name: M:FarPoint.Web.Spread.Model.Parser.TransferOperators(System.Collections.Stack,System.Collections.Stack,System.Int32)
member.summary: Transfers operators with precedence levels greater than or equal to the specified precedence level from the operator stack to the expression stack.

members.member:
Converts the string to an Expression object.
String to convert Base row position Base column position Whether to use R1C1 notation Table of custom functions Table of custom names The operator stack holds unary prefix operators, binary infix operators, functions, commas, and left parentheses until their corresponding operands are parsed. The expression stack holds sub-expressions while the text is being parsed.

member.name: T:FarPoint.Web.Spread.Model.BaseSheetStyleModel
member.summary: Represents the partial (abstract) implementation of the ISheetStyleModel interface for a style model for a sheet.

members.member:
Determines whether the model has no style settings.
This implementation always returns true.

Gets the style information as a composite of settings for the specified cell, column, row, or model default.
This implementation does nothing and returns null.
Row index of the cell in the model, or -1 to specify an entire column or the model default
Column index of the cell in the model, or -1 to specify an entire row or the model default
Alternating row index of the cell, or -1 to skip composing any alternating style
Destination StyleInfo object for composing the styles; if null, then a new StyleInfo should be created and used

Gets the direct style information for the specified cell, column, row, or model default.
This implementation does nothing and returns null.
Row index of the cell in the model, or -1 to specify an entire column or the model default
Column index of the cell in the model, or -1 to specify an entire row or the model default
Destination StyleInfo object for getting the style; if null, then a new StyleInfo should be created and used

Sets the direct style information for the specified cell, column, row, or model default.
This implementation does nothing.
Row index of the cell in the model, or -1 to specify an entire column or the model default
Column index of the cell in the model, or -1 to specify an entire row or the model default
Source StyleInfo object that has style information

Sets the specified alternating row style in the model.
This implementation does nothing and returns null.
Index of the alternating row style to set; must be between 0 and AltRowCount-1
Source StyleInfo object that has style information

member.name: M:FarPoint.Web.Spread.Model.BaseSheetStyleModel.IsRowUsed(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets whether the row contains style settings.
member.param: Row index

member.summary: Gets the index of the next column in a specified row that contains style settings.
member.param: Row index
Column index before the column to start looking (-1 to start at column 0)

member.name: M:FarPoint.Web.Spread.Model.BaseSheetStyleModel.NextNonEmptyRow(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the index of the next non-empty row after the specified row index.
member.param: Row index after which to start looking (-1 to start at row 0)

members.member:
Gets or sets the number of alternating row styles in the model.
This implementation does nothing and always returns 0.

Gets the number of columns in the model that contain style settings.
This implementation does nothing and always returns 0.

Gets the number of rows in the model that contain style settings.
This implementation does nothing and always returns 0.
